report.title: Group counts for an event
report.description: Gives the count of species groups recorded at an event.
report.query: (SELECT taxon_group, count(*) as count FROM cache_occurrences o #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND o.survey_id=#survey_id# AND o.date_start>='#date_from#' AND o.date_start<'#date_to#' GROUP BY taxon_group ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT #top_n_groups_to_include#) UNION SELECT 'Others', sum(count) FROM ( SELECT taxon_group, count(*) FROM cache_occurrences o #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND o.survey_id=#survey_id# AND o.date_start>='#date_from#' AND o.date_start<='#date_to#' GROUP BY taxon_group ORDER BY count(*) DESC OFFSET #top_n_groups_to_include# ) as sub ORDER BY taxon_group

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for, or leave for all surveys
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys
